p: The bacterial and fungal microorganisms used in this study were the Gram-positive bacteria Bacillus subtilis (ATCC 6633), Streptococcus mutans (ATCC 25175), Brevibacillus laterosporus wild strain, the Gram-negative bacteria Salmonella typhi wild strain, and the fungal strains Candida albicans (ATCC 60193) and Cryptococcus neoformans wild strain.
